function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of implementation of social distancing measures in local communities","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and spread within the community","Mitigation":"Enforcement of social distancing measures, closure of high-occupancy areas, and promotion of non-health-care-setting social-distancing measures","Technologies":"Monitoring and surveillance technology for compliance, communication technology for promoting guidelines","People":"Local community members, administrative authorities","Owner":"Local government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Inadequate understanding and implementation of environmental precautions","Impact":"Risk of viral spread and contamination on surfaces within the built environment","Mitigation":"Increased awareness and training on environmental precautions, use of effective chemical deactivation methods for viral particles on surfaces","Technologies":"Chemical deactivation methods, training and education materials","People":"Building operations and environmental services personnel","Owner":"Facility management, environmental services teams"}]}
